titlestmt.titleproper:
Guide to the Dickason Papers
1866-2000
MSS 172
titlestmt.author: Finding aid prepared by Fales staff. Processing date unknown. Finding aid by David Brown, 2010.

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using the Archivists' Toolkit 2011-03-14T13:56-0400

userestrict.head: Conditions Governing Use
userestrict.p: Collection use is subject to all copyright laws. Permission to publish materials must be obtained in writing from the Director of Fales Library and Special Collections. Please contact fales.library@nyu.edu. or call 212 998 2596.

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: Open to researchers. Appointments are necessary for the use of manuscript and archival collections.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: Box 5 consists of moving image and audio; box 5a consists of computer disks. These items are originals: no access copies currently exist for resarcher use.

odd.p: Box contains 5 small boxes and one larger box with "4 glass plates" written on it.
